snippet.title: Mul-Ty-Player - How I Made My Favourite Game Multiplayer
snippet.description:
Mul-Ty-Player by xMcacutt

Ty the Tasmanian Tiger is a 2002 3D Platformer / Collectathon developed by Krome Studios. In 2022, I joined the speedrunning community for the game and went on to develop the multiplayer mod for the game. I started this project with little to no programming experience and have had to learn every aspect of application development over two years. 

This video documents the history of the application and its development as well as hopefully serving to inspire other communities to push forwards and attempt similar projects.

SETUP: https://github.com/xMcacutt/Mul-Ty-Player/blob/master/Docs/User/User%20Guide.md
DOWNLOAD: https://github.com/xMcacutt/Mul-Ty-Player/releases

GITHUB: https://github.com/xMcacutt/Mul-Ty-Player/tree/master
SPEEDRUNNING DISCORD: https://discord.gg/Vkd2zQEdeJ
MODDING DISCORD: https://discord.gg/2jRZZcknkM
KROME STUDIOS: https://www.kromestudios.com/

____________________________________________________________________
